text: What is the syntax for querying by the ID column in HubDB?

are you referring to this?
`{% set table_info = hubdb_table_column(<tableId>, <columnId or column name>) %}`
The column is called `hs_id`, if you're just looking to print it
Having a weird HubDB issue where it’s not detecting the commas in the CSV I’m uploading, so it thinks everything is just one column instead of about 30. Anyone ever had this happen?
